page.title: 12BROOMFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school is of red brick construct- ion and was built in 1911 with the addition of a new hall in 1980. (June 1985) There are 270 children attending with a staff of 9 teachers, 1 headmaster,1 secretary, 1 welfare assistant, 3 kitchen staff, 5 mid-day assistants and 1 caretaker. The headmaster has organised a tuck shop where children may buy sweets and soft-drinks. The school has a few activities. Most Mondays top infants and first year juniors go swimming. Also on Mondays there is badminton. On Tuesdays there is Gymn, we use our own equipment e.g. crash-mat, spring- board and box,there is also Book club where you can by books from 30 pence to Â£1.75. Country dance club is on Wednesdays.
